com.rsc.rsclient.http
类 HttpRequestProxy

java.lang.Object
  com.rsc.rsclient.http.HttpRequestProxy
所有已实现的接口：
RequestProxyInterface
public class HttpRequestProxy
extends java.lang.Object
implements RequestProxyInterface

处理HTTP请求的代理类，实现接口RequestProxyInterface

changhu
